Articles.Content:
So that is the question.

It is semi-officially MIA. There was a thread about it a little while ago.

Anyone think it will be back for .21? Does anyone know?

Is anyone going to try and find it in .21?

Am I alone thinking its return is important?

Edited July 19, 2013 by bsalis

So that is the question.

It is semi-officially MIA. There was a thread about it a little while ago.

Anything think it will be back for .21? Does anyone know?

Is anyone going to try and find it in .21?

Am I alone thinking its return is important?

I think it's still in the game.

I think it's still in the game.

Actually it isn't, Nova checked and the line that should notify of it's presence in the console isn't there, he thinks it might've been removed by some accident.

Yeah, it's no longer showing in the developer console.

So it's gone, really gone...

Doh I spent a couple of late evenings last month looking for it and gave up feeling very inadequate. I must have done 50 plus orbits at a minimum trying my best not to look away from the screen. So thanks stupid_chris you have made me feel less stupid_bonyetty
I hope so. I, like others, want to go find it.
Magic boulder contains a liquid core, which, if ruptured, should not be touched, inhaled or looked at.
Too many people taunted the magic boulder. It's very shy. It probably went back home.
But...but... i wanted only a couple of pictures And maybe poke it a little bit to see what'll happen...

And maybe poke it a little bit to see what'll happen...

See that's why he ran away! You can't just poke things like that! Tsk, some people.
I wish it will not be so repulsive in 0.21 and it should have its own gravity so I can build magic boulder bases :3

I wish it will not be so repulsive in 0.21

I'm not even wondering why he left now, it's quite clear that you people are way too mean to him. And something this size would have an SOI smaller than it's own size, even with KSP's densities, so nah not really.
Maybe he only had a change of address? (Thats some kind of pun too, isnt it??)
Me and the magic boulder had a bit of an understanding. Id poke with my craft, and then he blew them up. It wasn't the best relationship, but it worked.
Yeah. IT is a shame it went poof. As I wanted to go there and have a Kerbal play whack the rock with a sledge hammer. Then take he bitz and see if I can make a magical space ship.
I guess it got mad when I crashed a ship into it back in 0.17.1.
Aww, I'm sad. I was totally prepared to make a research station with a grappling hook to get dragged by it...

Hold on it's not there!?

Looks like Milford spent 49 days for nothing

what????!!!!???

NO magic boulder? what fresh hell is this ?

I wish it will not be so repulsive in 0.21 and it should have its own gravity so I can build magic boulder bases :3

I don't think it needs gravity, it's small enough that you should be able to build a docking cage, or a grabber using landing gears that you can build a station around!

That's what I'd be trying if it hadn't disappeared.
whats the magic boulder?

"What if they've just said that the magic boulder was removed, so that we won't be looking at it anymore at Ike?" - Conspiracy Kerman

(oh, and 1000th post! )

whats the magic boulder?

If you have 10 minutes to spare, check this out.

Never went to search it before though...

whats the magic boulder?

Edit: GODDMMIT FLIXX, WHY DID YOU HAD TO NINJA ME THIS WAY FOR YOUR 1000TH POST
